name: Stop it !
description:
This is the first game that I release.

If you want your data to be stored in the browser (pseudo, best score, unlocked skins ...), you have to allow cookies.

Ads don't work in the browser, they only work in the android app. If you want to get the free chest or earn coins watching ads you need to download the app.

Please leave a comment if you see a bug or have any suggestion.
